    "실험3/실험셋업시각화_실험3시나리오7.pkl"
]
def _load(path):
    with open(path,'rb') as f:
        rtn = pickle.load(f)
    return rtn 
    
figs = {fname.replace('.pkl',''): _load(f'./실험결과/{fname}') for fname in file_names}
